title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 646-5.1 - Purpose and Intent
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 §§ 646-5.1 - Purpose and Intent

State Regulations

The purpose of this Subpart is to establish permit
requirements and standards for the protection of stream corridors within the

Lake George Park; to preserve the water quality of Lake George and its
tributaries; to protect the riparian and aquatic ecosystems of streams within
the Lake George Park; and to provide for the environmentally sound use of the

Lake George Park's land resources. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§§
646-5.1

Adopted

New

York State Register March 17, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 11, eff. 3/17/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
